rules.name: api-server-udp-1194
rules.description: For tunneled secure communication between the nodes and the control plane. This is not required for private clusters.

rules.name: api-server-tcp-9000
rules.description: For tunneled secure communication between the nodes and the control plane. This is not required for private clusters.

rules.name: ntp
rules.description: Required for Network Time Protocol (NTP) time synchronization on Linux nodes.

rules.name: custom-dns
rules.description: If you're using custom DNS servers, you must ensure they're accessible by the cluster nodes.

rules.name: api-server-https-443
rules.description: Required if running pods/deployments that access the API server, those pods/deployments would use the API IP. This is not required for private clusters.

rules.name: api-server-https-443
rules.description: Required for Node <-> API server communication. Replace <location> with the region where your AKS cluster is deployed.

rules.name: mcr-https
rules.description: Required to access images in Microsoft Container Registry (MCR). This registry contains first-party images/charts (for example, coreDNS, etc.). These images are required for the correct creation and functioning of the cluster, including scale and upgrade operations.

rules.name: mcr-data-https
rules.description: Required for MCR storage backed by the Azure content delivery network (CDN).

rules.name: azure-management
rules.description: Required for Kubernetes operations against the Azure API.

rules.name: aad-login
rules.description: Required for Azure Active Directory authentication.

rules.name: ms-packages
rules.description: This address is the Microsoft packages repository used for cached apt-get operations. Example packages include Moby, PowerShell, and Azure CLI.

rules.name: acs-mirror
rules.description: This address is for the repository required to download and install required binaries like kubenet and Azure CNI.

rules.name: ubuntu-security
rules.description: This address lets the Linux cluster nodes download the required security patches and updates.

rules.name: ubuntu-archive
rules.description: This address lets the Linux cluster nodes download the required security patches and updates.

rules.name: ubuntu-changelogs
rules.description: This address lets the Linux cluster nodes download the required security patches and updates.

rules.description: Required to authenticate with Log Analytics workspaces.
